text:
I came here for a company volunteering event , out of my curiosity , I read the google reviews before I came, and the reviews of the parents and previous students put up here made me cry.
The school is for the special needs children and they have a very strict check in and check out process to protect the children.
The teacher to student ratio is quite high, you can see almost one teacher is paired with a child with special needs. Although I was here for only half day, I am very impressed with the patience of the teacher to the individual student with lots of care and love, you will imagine how hard it is consistently.
Here is a place full of angels and love.

The school is really great with awesome teachers. My son attended the early intervention class for 2 .5 years and i nvr regretted enrolling my son. Well.done to the schools , staffs and especially the teachers
I was there since K2 hopefully the teacher there will remember me as I am now Secondary 4 taking my N-level exam soon.
The school is lively with students with special needs. There are classes for students 6 and below, to classes to 14 years old and above.
